data.title: The Kauai Inn
data.meta_description: Get in touch with The Kauai Inn for more information about our vacation property. Weâ€™d be happy to respond to your questions.
data.text:
Explore The Island From Our Kauai Hotel On Nawiliwili Bay

The Kaua'i Inn is centrally located, tucked away on three tropical acres where Nawiliwili Bay meets the Huleia River. Only 3 miles from the airport by Niumalu Beach Park near Kalapaki beach. Here you can access and enjoy activities such as golf, shopping, surfing, swimming, kayaking, boating, snorkeling, and more! The Kauai Inn is perfect for your Hawaiian vacation with affordable quality for visitors and Kama`ainas seeking relaxation and exploration!

Explore the Napali Coast by boat or helicopter. Enjoy the entertainment on riverboat tour down the Wailua River to the dramatic Fern Grotto. Take a charter fishing trip out of Nawiliwili Bay. Hike up to Hanakapiai Falls. Hit the links at Puakea Golf Course or kayak up the Huleia River viewing movie sites from Indiana Jones, Jurassic Park, and more! There's so much to experience on scenic Kauai, and it's all within easy reach of our convenient hotel location.
